ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 180
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, This list still exists, cool.  Well Troll SK the way to get the details of an item is to bring your mouse cursor over it in an inventory or persona view
ygData.messageBody:
Wow,

This list still exists, cool. Well Troll SK the way to get the details of an item is to bring your mouse cursor over it in an inventory or persona view and right click holding the button down. It's important to note you must own the item to get full details. Meaning if you are looking at someone else it will only give you the item name without stats. Good luck


> Message: 1
> Date: Wed, 29 Nov 2000 17:36:51 -0000
> From: troll_sk@...
> Subject: How to View an Iteam?!?
>
> Hello All,
>
> OK, so I'm wondering how I view the details of an Iteam... I see
> iteam details on web pages all the time. I would like to be able to
> get this in the game so the next time I see a Ring Cloak I won't buy
> it thinking I can wear it.
>
> ~Thanks, Troll SK
